title: Browser Platform Publisher Keys v3
description: Deployment Keys for the Plasmo's BPP Action.

zip.description: The zip file containing the extension. `{version}` can be used in the name and will be replaced by the version in the manifest.json file.

notes.description: Provide notes for certification to the Edge Add-ons reviewers

target.description: The target audience to publish to. Defaults to 'default'

uploadOnly.description: Only upload the extension, do not publish it. Defaults to false

Firefox.description: For API Key and API Secret, visit: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addon/api/key/

extId.description: This is the extension UUID, get it from https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addon/{ext-name}/edit, under Technical Details. If it is embedded in your manifest under gecko.id, omit this property.

productId.description: Create an Edge add-on and get it from the dashboard: https://partner.microsoft.com/en-us/dashboard/microsoftedge/{product-id}/package/dashboard

clientId.description: You can find your client ID by visiting the Microsoft Partner Center:  https://partner.microsoft.com/en-us/dashboard/microsoftedge/publishapi

clientSecret.description: You can find your client secret by visiting the Microsoft Partner Center:  https://partner.microsoft.com/en-us/dashboard/microsoftedge/publishapi

accessTokenUrl.description: You can find your access token URL by visiting the Microsoft Partner Center:  https://partner.microsoft.com/en-us/dashboard/microsoftedge/publishapi

Opera.description: NOTE: Opera add-ons reviewer require inspecting your extension's source code.

changelog.description: Provide changelog for the Opera users
